channel.title: Orders on Parcel2Go API Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Orders on Parcel2Go API Docs

item.title: Orders
item.description:
The flow for processing an order is to first create an order which if successful will return an OrderId, then to pay for the order referncing the order by Id.

Note

All API calls require authentication with bearer tokens via the Authorization header. See Authentication

Creating an Orders

Swagger Document and Demo


curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'Authorization: Bearer {TOKEN_HERE}' -d '{ \ 
   "Items": [ \ 
     { \ 
       "Id": "e7f228dd-95cc-4b5f-83d7-b901e120df73", \ 
       "CollectionDate": "2018-01-02T10:05:36.1002804+00:00", \ 
       "Upsells": [ \ 
         { \ 
           "Type": "" \ 
         } \ 
       ], \ 
       "Parcels": [ \ 
         { \ 
           "Id": "aa18be6f-d93d-4a73-bd32-08291b882068", \ 
           "Height": 10.5, \ 
           "Length": 10.5, \ 
           "EstimatedValue": 100.99, \ 
           "Weight": 10, \ 
           "Width": 15, \ 
           "DeliveryAddress": { \ 
             "ContactName": "John Jiggery", \ 
             "Email": "delivery@example.com", \ 
             "Property": "The Cube", \ 
             "Street": "Coe Street", \ 
             "Town": "Bolton", \ 
             "County": "Bolton", \ 
             "Postcode": "BL3 6BU", \ 
             "CountryIsoCode": "GBR" \ 
           }, \ 
           "ContentsSummary": "Slippers" \ 
         } \ 
       ], \ 
       "Service": "yodel-24", \ 
       "CollectionAddress": { \ 
         "ContactName": "James Jammy", \ 
         "Email": "james@example.com", \ 
         "Phone": "077777777777", \ 
         "Organisation": "Parcel2Go", \ 
         "Property": "11", \ 
         "Street": "Saville St", \ 
         "Locality": "", \ 
         "Town": "Malton", \ 
         "County": "North Yorkshire", \ 
         "Postcode": "YO17 7LL", \ 
         "CountryIsoCode": "GBR", \ 
         "SpecialInstructions": "" \ 
       } \ 
     } \ 
   ], \ 
   "CustomerDetails": { \ 
     "Email": "test@example.com", \ 
     "Forename": "Joe", \ 
     "Surname": "Blogs" \ 
   } \ 
 }' 'https://www.parcel2go.com/api/orders'

Paying for an Orders

In order to pay for an order a token must be provided which has the payment scope.


curl -X POST --header 'Accept: application/json'  --header 'Authorization: Bearer {TOKEN_HERE}' 'https://www.parcel2go.com/api/orders/123/paywithprepay'
